name: Kite or Flight
description:
Have a great day with your kite through the forest, but don't forget to be careful - there are many dangers in the forest. Control your kite to avoid birds and other typical things you may encounter in the forest, such as... a.. Airplanes?

What is kiting or flying

Have a great day with your kite through the forest, but don't forget to be careful - there are lots of dangers in the forest. Control your kite to avoid birds and other typical things you may encounter in the forest, such as... a.. Planes?

Controls

[Mouse]
Control the kite

[Spacebar]
Jump

Team

The process

The game was completed in 8 hours by students from Uppsala University.
